song.title: Running in the Rain
song.info:
From Soundcloud: Guess it's time for another happy tune \o/
I even spend some hours on a cute animation for a video. [url]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ezim2r55CvE[/url]
Tracked with Open Modplug Tracker, Mastered with Adobe Audition.
Thanks for Listening <3 Feedback always welcome :)
